fields.label: Home Page Post Count
fields.name: indexPagePostCount
fields.hint: The number of posts to show on the home page.

fields.label: List Page Post Count
fields.name: listPagePostCount
fields.hint: The number of posts to show on the All Posts page and category pages that lists posts.

fields.label: Recent Posts Widget Post Count
fields.name: recentPostsWidgetPostCount
fields.hint: The number of posts to show in the Recent Posts widget.

fields.label: Recent Posts Widget Post Categories
fields.name: recentPostsWidgetPostCategories
fields.hint: The categories to show recent posts for. This allows you to only show categories of interest.

field.label: Category Name
field.name: categoryName
field.hint: Specify a category name, or set this to all to capture all categories.

fields.label: All Posts List URL Slug
fields.name: allPostsListSlug
fields.hint: The slug used to access the All Posts page. Example: /posts

fields.label: Post Category List URL Slug
fields.name: postCategoryListSlug
fields.hint: The slug prefix used to access post lists for categories. For example, if you set this to "/posts/category" and your category is "adventure", then the full path to access the category post list would become "/posts/category/adventure"

fields.label: Featured Post Enabled
fields.name: featuredPostEnabled
fields.hint: When switched on, the post with the slug below will appear on the index page as the featured post.

fields.label: Featured The Newest Post
fields.name: featureNewestPostEnabled
fields.hint: When switched on, the newest post will be featured and the selected post below will be ignored.

fields.label: Featured Post
fields.name: featuredPostSlug
fields.hint: Choose post you'd like to feature. You must switch off the "Feature The Newest Post" settings for this to take effect.

fields.label: Content Cue Text
fields.name: contentCueText
fields.hint: The cue text above the title that informs the reader what the section is for. Set to none to disable.

fields.label: Custom Title Text
fields.name: customTitleText
fields.hint: The title text. Set to none to use the post title.

fields.label: Custom Teaser
fields.name: customTeaser
fields.hint: The teaser text used to get the reader to click. Set to none to use the post excerpt.

fields.label: Left Teaser Quote
fields.name: leftQuote
fields.hint: The left quote for the teaser text. Set to none for no quotes.

fields.label: Right Teaser Quote
fields.name: rightQuote
fields.hint: The right quote for the teaser text. Set to none for no quotes.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: buttonText
fields.hint: The text for the button. Set to none to disable.
